description: Internal alterations: relocation of staircases between lower ground and ground floors, repositioning of a lift and the introduction of modern partition walls ***WITHDRAWN***
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_: Planning permission (ref. PP/24/00878) and listed building consent (ref. LB/24/00879) was granted on 14 May 2024 for: “Change of use of existing retail unit to Class E at ground and lower ground floor level, including alterations to shopfront, installation of new ventilation duct in western lightwell to serve restaurant and associated works. External and internal alterations including subdivision of existing retail unit at lower ground and ground floor to three separate units to create two retail units and restaurant, and associated works.”
